source: TEXT_FESNYRWILSHOGUN2014_00146_BLACKGENERAL_000_000<tab>One of the luminaries of Ul'dah was once that which the blood-drunk call a gladiator, and lo, this Raubahn wears a bull's head.
target:
TEXT_FESNYRWILSHOGUN2014_00146_BLACKGENERAL_000_000聞いた話によると、このウルダハで中核を担っている
ラウバーンという男は、牛の頭を身につけているとか……。

source: TEXT_FESNYRWILSHOGUN2014_00146_BLACKGENERAL_000_001<tab>By that bull's head, I mark him as an ally likely! For lo, the wearer of a horse's head and the wearer of a bull's head are more alike than one with no head to wear at all!
target:
TEXT_FESNYRWILSHOGUN2014_00146_BLACKGENERAL_000_001ブルゥゥゥゥゥン……ッ！
牛頭に馬頭とは、親近感があるのである。
きっと良い関係が築けることであろうな！

source: TEXT_FESNYRWILSHOGUN2014_00146_BLACKGENERAL_000_010<tab>I mark that you wear no head, alack! Where is the uma kabuto that is your badge of honor in Ul'dah?
target:
TEXT_FESNYRWILSHOGUN2014_00146_BLACKGENERAL_000_010ブルゥゥゥゥゥン……ッ！
おぬし、なぜ「」を被っておらぬ！？

source: TEXT_FESNYRWILSHOGUN2014_00146_BLACKGENERAL_000_011<tab>A kabuto astray is no great matter! Take another and lo, know that in places least expected will you find the greatest allies!
target:
TEXT_FESNYRWILSHOGUN2014_00146_BLACKGENERAL_000_011なくしたなら、替えを持っていくがよい。
「」は、いつまでもおぬしと共にあるぞ！
